text: Ej kasone, ki imon ovardaed, az ƣajri xudaton [dustu] hamroz nagired. Onon az hec noʙakori [va sarre] dar haqqi sumo kutohi namekunand [va] dust dorand, ki sumo dar rancu zahmat ʙosed. Dar haqiqat, [nisonahoi] dusmani az guftorason oskor ast va on ci dar dilhojason pinhon medorand ʙuzurgtar ast. Agar ʙijandesed, hatman, [xohed donist, ki] mo nisonaho [-i pandomuz va rohi saodati dunjo va oxirat]-ro ʙarojaton ʙa ravsani ʙajon kardaem
